messages.content: My friend just bought an iPad Pro from the U.S., and she claims itâ€™s cheaper even after shipping. Is that true generally? Can you find the current price of an iPad Pro 13-inch (2024 model) in India and in the U.S.?

reasoning: To compare the price of the iPad Pro 13-inch (2024 model) in India and the U.S., I'll first search for the price in the U.S. using Google Shopping. This will help me determine if the claim about it being cheaper is valid.

arguments.query: iPad Pro price after shipping charges
